input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral)

Item features:
Snap-fit visor
In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner
Acu Dial fit system
20 vents
input_text.Response A: The Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet represents the pinnacle of safety, comfort and style. The revolutionary Acu Dial fit system provides a precise, custom fit in seconds. With its In-Mold polycarbonate shell and EPS liner, the Skyla is both light and durable while offering superior impact protection. The Skyla also features a snap-fit visor for enhanced aerodynamics and 20 vents to keep you cool and comfortable on even the hottest days.
input_text.Response B:
Here's a fun product description for you:

This cool pink helmet has a snap-fit visor to protect your eyes from the sun. It's made with a strong outer shell and soft lining that fits your head perfectly. The helmet has 20 vents to keep you cool and comfortable while you ride your bike. It's a great choice for kids who love riding their bikes and want to look cool while they do it!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_b: Implies product is for children when the prompt states women. Uses more general terms rather than the keywords provided.
